title: Blackthorne
description: A world of darkness and mystery... That was what Olivia St. John discovered when she arrived at Blackthorne to serve as governess. But she was determined to unover the secrets that haunted the estate of Lord Quenton Stamford, and bring the enigmatic nobleman out of his self-imposed gloom. Quenton Stamford had vowed that he would never trust a woman again. Until Olivia St. John came into his life. Her determination to overcome her own hardships had awakened him from a long and lonely nightmare. But could he ever follow her example and learn to live - and love - again?
author: Ruth Ryan Langan
